pages.text: Some dinos can be tamed. However, most adult dinos cannot be domesticated, so you'll have to obtain a Fertilized Egg to tame the baby instead. $(br2)Some dinos are either too smart, too stupid, or simply too aggressive to be able to be domesticated, regardless of their age.

Obtaining a Fertilized Egg can be done in two ways: Breeding a male and a female, or killing a female for a small chance of the egg to drop. If the dino is wild, killing the female may be your best bet.

Carnivorous baby dinos will generally take any raw meat, eggs, or fish as food to tame them. Herbivorous babies will take fruits, vegetables, and grains. $(br2)If you fail to tame a baby before they grow, they may turn on you since they're still wild. Tame them fast!
